title: Shaking the Foundations
itunes:title: Shaking the Foundations
description: Grace shakes us to the foundations, provoking in us a keen awareness of our own sinfulness, and offering us the liberating power of the forgiveness of our sins. Once transformed by God's grace, we are sent out on mission and through our mission, we share with others the Grace that we have received.

Once transformed by God's grace, we are sent out on mission and through our mission, we share with others the Grace that we have received.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
